# ErdalToprak.com

> This website is Erdal Toprak's personal website. It is built with Astro and deployed on Cloudflare Pages.

## Pages

- [Home](https://erdaltoprak.com)
- [Blog](https://erdaltoprak.com/blog)
- [Projects](https://erdaltoprak.com/projects)
- [About](https://erdaltoprak.com/about)

# Docs

- [Github](https://github.com/erdaltoprak/erdaltoprak.com) : Source code of this website.
